CONVERSATION GROUP: Golgamann here thinks that one of our clients, Velop, is in trouble. He's lost somewhere, probably naked and eating his own fingers for sustenance. Heh heh.
So, what say we spend a ludicrous amount of potential world-saving time to track down someone you've never met and protect that person from some unspecified potential danger?

No! Got it! I know Velop! Walks around like he owns the place, when he knows who the true Lord of the Dark is. I'd have worn his entrails as a belt by now if it wasn't for the fact that he brews amazing beverages.
Hey, I don't make these things up. I just say them out loud when they pop in my head.

Yes, yes. Flattery will get you nowhere, minion, though it may stave off your death for a tenday or more. I am not responsible for any premature deaths you may experience before the tenday is through.
Izhkin told us that your were in danger.
Wait, Izhkin, how much does he owe you?
Goblin blood is extremely difficult to get off clothes.
Why? Why would you kill Trax? He was probably just defending his home... or attacking everything that moves. No, I get it now. Trax probably had to die.
We do? Well then. We might have to have a conversation about your future as an underling.
BK men -> people as per WOTC
